channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 7:01 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in the Kyiv region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 7:01 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in the Kyiv region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Київська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
